description: This version of the  Baby emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported platforms. Copy an
apple_vendor_description: The dark skin tone baby emoji on Apple devices is a heartwarming depiction of a young child, presented with Apple's hallmark smooth gradients and soft rounded edges for an ultra-cute and cuddly appearance. Realistic lighting accentuates its innocent features and rosy cheeks, giving it a vibrant and healthy glow. This charming emoji, often used to represent newborns, childhood joy, or a sense of tender affection, adds a touch of warmth and sweetness to any message on Apple devices.
